name: Cornucopia (SweetPotatoMash)
description:
Use your Cornucopia Gun to suck up crops and launch them at enemies. Swap between different crops to change your ammo. How many waves can you survive?

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • Mouse Right Click - Suck up crops
  • Mouse Left Click - Shoot crops
  • 1/2/3 = Switch between ammo types
  • Esc - Quit Game
